examples: Attempts are being made to solve the problem of waste disposal.
Se está intentando solucionar el problema de la eliminación de residuos.
para resolver un problema / una crisis
You can't solve anything by just running away.
No puedes resolver nada simplemente huyendo.
I hope that he can find a good way to solve these problems.
Espero que pueda encontrar una buena manera de resolver estos problemas.
